pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualization of Simulated Datasets with Multiple Simulation Input Dimensions // Plots simulation results of clinical trials. Its main feature is allowing users to simultaneously investigate the impact of several simulation input dimensions through dynamic filtering of the simulation results. A more detailed description of the app can be found in Meyer et al. DOI:10.1016/j.softx.2023.101347 or the vignettes on 'GitHub'.
